pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Jacdac PythonA Python client and server SDK for Jacdac.**Jacdac** is a plug-and-play hardware/software stackfor **microcontrollers** and their peripherals (sensors/actuators),with applications to rapid prototyping, making, and physical computing.- **[Jacdac Home](https://aka.ms/jacdac/)**- **[Jacdac Python Documentation](https://microsoft.github.io/jacdac-docs/clients/python/)**- **[API Reference](https://jacdac-python.readthedocs.io/)**- Discussions at https://github.com/microsoft/jacdac/discussions- Issues are tracked on https://github.com/microsoft/jacdac/issues
